Title: Relates to providing for the remote conduct of certain practices and procedures
Summary: Provides for the remote conduct of certain practices and procedures utilizing electronic and/or audio-visual technologies.
LawCode: Amd §§708, 602 & 605, BC L; amd §§603 & 605, N-PC L; amd §11, Bank L; amd §171, Tax L; add §137-a, Exec L; amd §§3-2.1 & 7-1.17, EPT L; amd §§2981 & 4201, Pub Health L; add §304-a, RP L; amd §5-1514, Gen Ob L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the business corporation law, the not-for-profit corporation law, the banking law, the tax law, the executive law, the estates, powers and trusts law, the public health law, the real property law and the general obligations law, in relation to providing for the remote conduct of certain practices and procedures
